content: As it relates to 2022, the guide of 200 to 300 basis points a year, that's an average over a longer period of time for the reasons that I described in the call, and I've spoken to in the past as it relates to implementation investments to support our large backlog as well as the MK Decision acquisition being a headwind to gross margin in 2022, we're not going to achieve the 200 to 300 basis points expansion this year.
